title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Short-Term Intensive Instructional Design for Improving Cultural Inclusivity

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic design principles and educational technology concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competencies in Developing Inclusive Educational Materials for Students with Diverse Cultural Backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cultural biases and apply inclusive design principles
Learners can evaluate the accessibility of educational content referencing AECT ethical standards
Learners can plan and produce microlearning content optimized for mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
